overview: A homage to the French light comedy classics such as the works of Jacques Tati, An Afternoon at the Beach is short film that tells the tale of a French sailor visiting the beach during the 1920s and follows him through his various setbacks as he makes a new friend
tagline: A French Sailor goes to the beach during the 1920s and through various setbacks makes a new friend.
title: An Afternoon At The Beach
